description: This is a short loop trail that wraps around Pink Lake in Gatineau Park.  The trail is well maintained and easy to follow.  Pink Lake is a typical shield lake. The trail goes up and down a lot but none of the climbs will pose any problems for anyone able to walk.
directions: From the south entrance of Gatineau Park follow the parkway about five kilometers heading northwest.  The trail is clearly marked.  Turn right and drive into the trail head parking lot.
title: Pink Lake Trail - Gatineau Park
